content.$t: abouttitle: Welcome, abouttext: Whether you’re new to dance and have always wanted to try it or you’re an experienced dancer, TADA welcomes all ages and skill levels from beginner to pre-professional level as well as those with disabilities. TADA offers a wide variety of classes in dance and fitness from Ballet, Tap, Jazz, Modern, Hip-Hop, Pointe, Salsa, Bachata, Ballroom, and more., valueslist: Be Passionate and Courageous, rentalinfo: TADA is an amazing event facilty. We host workshops, auditions, Master Classes, rehearsals, and performances. We can accomodate up to 325 for an audition. We also have an in-studio performance space that can seat 200., rentaltype: Studio 1, rentaldescrip: ~900 s.f., rentalrate: hardwood floor

gsx$abouttext.$t: Whether you’re new to dance and have always wanted to try it or you’re an experienced dancer, TADA welcomes all ages and skill levels from beginner to pre-professional level as well as those with disabilities. TADA offers a wide variety of classes in dance and fitness from Ballet, Tap, Jazz, Modern, Hip-Hop, Pointe, Salsa, Bachata, Ballroom, and more.

gsx$rentalinfo.$t: TADA is an amazing event facilty. We host workshops, auditions, Master Classes, rehearsals, and performances. We can accomodate up to 325 for an audition. We also have an in-studio performance space that can seat 200.

content.$t: abouttitle: Our Vision, abouttext: The vision of TADA is to celebrate finding the joy in movement with a fun, healthy and collaborative energy for all that have a passion or interest in dance and fitness excellence. TADA aims to create a quality studio experience that bows to the benefits of dance - confidence and expression, true body connection, and the learning process of creative arts – and to break down the barriers that are often present in more traditional schools of dance education., valueslist: Be Fun and Creative, rentalinfo: Price can vary depending upon the size of the group and whether it's a long term or short term rental. Deposit & liability insurance is required., rentaltype: Studio 2, rentaldescrip: ~1300 s.f., rentalrate: sprung with Harlequin Marley

gsx$abouttext.$t: The vision of TADA is to celebrate finding the joy in movement with a fun, healthy and collaborative energy for all that have a passion or interest in dance and fitness excellence. TADA aims to create a quality studio experience that bows to the benefits of dance - confidence and expression, true body connection, and the learning process of creative arts – and to break down the barriers that are often present in more traditional schools of dance education.

gsx$rentalinfo.$t: Price can vary depending upon the size of the group and whether it's a long term or short term rental. Deposit & liability insurance is required.

content.$t: abouttitle: Our Facility, abouttext: TADA’s new state-of-the-art facility showcases four spacious studios with a sprung floor system, an in studio performance space, and large dressing rooms. TADA’s instructors deliver excellence and quality in their group classes, private lessons and specialty workshops., valueslist: Be Humble and Kind, rentalinfo: Email info@tadaatlanta.com for quotes., rentaltype: Studio 3, rentaldescrip: ~1300 s.f., rentalrate: sprung with Harlequin Marley

gsx$abouttext.$t: TADA’s new state-of-the-art facility showcases four spacious studios with a sprung floor system, an in studio performance space, and large dressing rooms. TADA’s instructors deliver excellence and quality in their group classes, private lessons and specialty workshops.

content.$t: valueslist: Be Warm and Nurturing, rentaltype: Studio 4, rentaldescrip: ~1200 s.f., rentalrate: sprung with Harlequin Marley
valueslist: Make Dance Accessible to All, rentaltype: Studio 5 (3&4 combined), rentaldescrip: ~2500 s.f., rentalrate: sprung with Harlequin Marley
